attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Cane needs to be brought back into Schools ASAP as the young people today have no sense of discipline or respect for anybody. Since previous Governments have scrapped the cane and other forms of physical discipine within the household, Kids have become increasingly more Anti-Social.
Its easy for the ruling parties to blame the parent, however, it is the ruling parties that have handcuffed the parents and schools from taking appropriate action.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
